867160.name: Tomb of the Overlord
867160.description:
A necromancer is disturbing a local graveyard, and his skeletal legions rise from the grave! In Tomb of the Overlord, up to four players venture into cursed crypts, forests and graveyards, fight through waves of undead, and uncover lost secrets to grow stronger. Choose your starting class, then expand your abilities through a deep multiclass system, combining attacks, spells, auras, summons, and other powerful abilities to create your perfect build. Will you become an unstoppable warrior-mage, a cunning rogue-priest, or something entirely unique?

Each run brings new challenges, new loot, and new ways to master the battlefield. Team up with friends or go solo in your quest to help a local alchemist get some grave moss or clean up some bandits from the local graveyard, and hope you don't run into any trouble!

Key Features

  • 1-4 Player Co-op – Brave the tombs alone or with friends in online co-op.

  • Multiclass System – Mix and match attacks, spells, auras, and summons from different classes to create your own playstyle.

  • Deep Ability Customization – Unlock devastating melee strikes, ranged spells, lingering auras, summoned minions, and other abilities as you level up.

  • Dynamic Combat – Engage in real-time battles with fluid movement, dodge mechanics, and skill-based attacks.

  • Dynamic Exploration – Discover areas that may change with hidden secrets, randomized elements, and event-driven paths leading to new challenges every attempt.
867160.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
